pr_title: Add a line in /map showing which pools a map is in, if any.

timeline.message:
Adds a check on /map that will show which pools a map is included in, if any.

Signed-off-by: KingOfSquares <simonmorland@gmail.com>

Adds a check on /map that will show which pools a map is included in, if any.

Signed-off-by: KingOfSquares <simonmorland@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText:
This feels so specific that it looks out of place.
Just from wherever you call, do:
poolManager.getPools().stream()
    .filter(p -> p.getMaps().contains(map)).collect(Collectors.toList());
timeline.author: Pablete1234
Pablete1234

replies.bodyText: With the filter it will give me all MapPools i want right. But how do i make a Collector that collects all those MapPools names.
replies.author: KingOfSquares

replies.bodyText: Nvm, i think i figured it out!
replies.author: KingOfSquares

timeline.author: Pablete1234

timeline.message:
Remove unneeded methods. Use Streams!
